all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Behold, this is mine authority, and the authority of my servants, and my preface unto the book of my commandments, which I have given them to publish unto you, O inhabitants of the earth.
Doctrine and Covenants 1:6
Quote of the Day
"Because of the redeeming life and mission of our Saviour, Jesus Christ, we can—and should—be the most joyful people on earth!"
Patrick Kearon | 1 Oct 2024General Conference
